summary: TWO HEAD GASKETS BLEW WITH MY 1999 FORD TAURUS VIN #[XXX] AT 46,000 MILES HAVE DETAILED AND EXCELLENT MAINTENANCE ON THIS VEHICLE. THERMOSTAT WAS COOKED AND NO OVERHEATING, JUST LOST OF HEAT. JUST HAD A SENSOR REPLACED.  *NLM    INFORMATION REDACTED PURSUANT TO THE FREEDOM OF INFORMATION ACT (FOIA), 5 U.S.C. 552(B)(6).  *TR
